segments.text: Will we drive to the seaside ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it will take about four hours . We can leave about noon and get there by supper time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me help pay for gas .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . There will be three of us going so we will each pay a third .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What other expenses will we have ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There won't be many other expenses expect food .
segments.speaker: S2
